flavorText.text:
たいきの　どくそを　ぶんかいして
あれた　だいちを　いっしゅんのうちに
はなばたけにする　ちからを　もつ。

グラシデアのはなが　さく　きせつ
かんしゃの　こころを　とどけるために
とびたつと　いわれている。

たいきの　どくそを　ぶんかいして
あれた　だいちを　いっしゅんのうちに
はなばたけにする　ちからを　もつ。

グラシデアのはなが　さく　きせつ
かんしゃの　こころを　とどけるために
とびたつと　いわれている。

대기의 독소를 분해해서
거칠어진 대지를 일순간에
꽃밭으로 만드는 힘을 가지고 있다.

그라시데아꽃이 피는 계절에
감사의 마음을 전하기 위해
날아오른다고 전해진다.

대기의 독소를 분해해서
거칠어진 대지를 일순간에
꽃밭으로 만드는 힘을 가지고 있다.

그라시데아꽃이 피는 계절에
감사의 마음을 전하기 위해
날아오른다고 전해진다.

Les fleurs qui couvrent son corps
s’ouvrent quand il est câliné avec
amour et perçoit de la gratitude.

Les fleurs qui couvrent son corps
s’ouvrent quand il est câliné avec
amour et perçoit de la gratitude.

Il peut dissoudre les toxines dans l’air pour
transformer un désert en un champ de fleurs
luxuriantes.

Il prend son essor pour répandre la gratitude lorsque
les Gracidées fleurissent.

Il peut dissoudre les toxines dans l’air pour transformer
un désert en un champ de fleurs luxuriantes.

Il prend son essor pour répandre la gratitude lorsque
les Gracidées fleurissent.

Es kann die Luft von Giften reinigen und Ödland
in ein üppig blühendes Blumenfeld verwandeln.

Es heißt, wenn die Gracidea blühen, drückt es seine
Dankbarkeit aus, indem es hoch in die Lüfte fliegt.

Es kann die Luft von Giften reinigen und Ödland in ein üppig
blühendes Blumenfeld verwandeln.

Es heißt, wenn die Gracidea blühen, drückt es seine
Dankbarkeit aus, indem es hoch in die Lüfte fliegt.

Puede disolver las toxinas del aire para transformar
tierra yerma en campos de flores.

Se dice que, cuando florecen las Gracídeas, Shaymin
alza el vuelo para mostrar su gratitud.

Puede disolver las toxinas del aire para transformar tierra
yerma en campos de flores.

Se dice que, cuando florecen las Gracídeas, Shaymin alza el
vuelo para mostrar su gratitud.

Può dissolvere le tossine nell’aria per mutare
all’istante una terra arida in un rigoglioso campo
fiorito.

Si narra che Shaymin si alzi in volo per esprimere
commossa gratitudine per la fioritura delle gracidee.

Può dissolvere le tossine nell’aria per mutare all’istante
una terra arida in un rigoglioso campo fiorito.

Si narra che Shaymin si alzi in volo per esprimere commossa
gratitudine per la fioritura delle gracidee.

It lives in flower patches and
avoids detection by curling up
to look like a flowering plant.

It can dissolve toxins in the air
to instantly transform ruined land
into a lush field of flowers.

The flowers all over its body burst
into bloom if it is lovingly hugged
and senses gratitude.

The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers
the power of flight upon it. Feelings 
of gratitude are the message it delivers.

The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers
the power of flight upon it. Feelings 
of gratitude are the message it delivers.

The flowers all over its body burst
into bloom if it is lovingly hugged
and senses gratitude.

into bloom if it is lovingly hugged
and senses gratitude.

into bloom if it is lovingly hugged
and senses gratitude.

The flowers all over its body burst
into bloom if it is lovingly hugged
and senses gratitude.

It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly
transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the
power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are
the message it delivers.

It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly
transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the
power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are
the message it delivers.

When the turning of seasons brings the cruel winter to its end
and the joyous people give thanks to the heavens, Shaymin
appears and covers the withered land with flowers.
